attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am a yr 8 student and personally know home work teaches you nothing but just repeats what you were taught in lesson i shall now take some wise words my old food tech teacher told me '' the best way to teach is not by telling or showing but is by letting you do'' i have never learnt any thing from home work and my friends agree
